articles.title: Central Asian migrants face xenophobic backlash in Russia after Moscow terror attack - CNN
articles.description: The four men accused of a deadly terror attack on Moscow’s Crocus City concert hall last week were quickly identified by Russian authorities as being from Tajikistan, a former Soviet republic in Central Asia.
